name: New Berzerk - Ad Free
description:
Based on the classic 1980's arcade game Berzerk© from Stern Electronics, New Berzerkis just like the old but updated for today's mobile phones. There are Robots that you need to shoot. A giant orb named Crazy Mono endlessly trying to murder you. And an endless maze which you need to traverse trying to escape.

New Berzerk is absolutely free for everyone. Enjoy!

Any questions or concerns? Email us: kimun8tytech@gmail.com
